value: A few days later､ Hideo was waiting to meet up with Producer for a different job’s meeting.
(Producer’s… not here yet. I guess I came here too early.)
sad
(I have a bit of time left､ so I’ll just wander around this area… Huh? That’s…)
(It’s the student I spotted before､ right? But at this hour､ students should still be in school…)
(….Aah. I remember now. If I’m not mistaken､ that girl’s…)
normal
Hey. It’s been a while. Do you still remember me?
…What do you want? If you’re trying to pick me up､ sorry､ I… Wait— Could you be Akuno-san?
joy
Looks like you remembered who I was. That’s nice to hear.
…There’s no way I could forget you. This police officer in the juvenile division who had a terrifying smile…
Listened to what I had to say with a really friendly attitude… That gap was no joke､ honestly.
sad
I get the feeling that you remembered me unwillingly､ but… whatever. A lot sure happened that time､ too.
normal
By the way､ are you on break from class today? It’s still a weekday and it’s still morning…
sad
…Clamming up､ are we? Hey､ if you have something you’re worried about again…
…Akuno-san､ I know you quit as a police officer. You’re working as an idol now. I’ve seen you on TV.
I don’t feel like being told to do this and that by someone who’s not even a policeman､ so… just leave me alone.
Hey､ wait up…! Darn､ she left.
Judging by how she was acting､ I guess something happened again. But what do I do…
